column2: "...I must say, not even I am sure how to put these feelings into words..."
"I wanted to learn so much from Zephetto."
"And, given enough time, perhaps we could've come to understand each other..."
"Yeah..."
"That being said, we don't have the luxury of standing around like this."

"If we're about to be visited by some great threat,
we'll have to put everything into preparing for it."
"Ilma, about that..."
"Hm? What's up?"
"It seems that Zephetto has left us with a parting gift."
"A parting gift?"

"Do you remember how we couldn't solve
that problem with our arms development?"
"Well, how couldn't I?"

"I've been up all hours of every night wracking
my brain trying to come up with some sort of solution."
"It seems Zephetto had me \"memorize\" a solution to the problem."
"S-Say what?!"
"Please take a look at this."
"Put this like that... and the connection over here to over there..."
"Huh? But if I do, this'll..."
"No, wait... If that goes like this..."
"Huhh? Hold on a second..."
"Wow! That did it."
"How could I have missed something like this?!"
"Zephetto... well, he was a proper engineer, that's for sure."
"Alright! With this, I'll finally be able to complete it!"
"<%me>! Just you wait!"
"I'll definitely build you a weapon capable of defeating this \"Vael\" guy!"
